channel.title: Can we make servers using
channel.description:
i just need to know on something. kk first i know u need a modem to make a server.
BUT im on a LAPTOP and i dont got a modem.. BUTT! im stealing someones internet with my wireless built-in. also when i went to check if i had a modem it said i had some bradcom modem or sumthing like that.
so i jsut needa know if i could make a server using this PLEASEE SOMEONE REPLYY :P
[update] yeah i checked and i do have some sort of modem in my laptop

item.title: Can we make servers using
item.dc:creator: @v13tth0rn v13tth0rn
item.description:
@v13tth0rn wrote:

wow lol idc… all i want is some1 to answer my question[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2008, 08:10:48 PM[/size][hr]also because im to lagy (downloading stuff atm) i cant to modify my post so im jsut gonna post it.

if i can make a server could someone help me out with the hard bits.ty[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2008, 10:57:01 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Jono22, post:2, topic:177508”]You can Download Hamchi, by googling it, or going to Tico13’s guide on making a server.

When your using Hamachi, you don’t need a modem, so you can make a server that way.

Hope This Helps :)[/quote] also is it easier/quicker to make a hamachi server?

Read full topic

item.title: Can we make servers using
item.dc:creator: @Jono22 Jono22
item.description:
@Jono22 wrote:

You can Download Hamchi, by googling it, or going to Tico13’s guide on making a server.

When your using Hamachi, you don’t need a modem, so you can make a server that way.

Hope This Helps
